member.name: T:JsonMerge.JsonMerger
member.summary: Simply and elegantly merge values into an existing JSON object.

member.name: M:JsonMerge.JsonMerger.MergeJson(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Merges JSON objects together, with merge values overwriting input values for matching keys.
member.param: The JSON object to merge into the input. If the input already contains a key specified in mergeJson, it will be overwritten by the value in mergeJson.
member.returns: A JSON string based on inputJson with merged and overwritten values based on mergeJson.

member.name: M:JsonMerge.JsonMerger.MergeObjects(System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonObject,System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonObject)
member.summary: Recursively merges properties from source into target.
member.param: The target JSON object to merge into.
The source JSON object to merge from.

member.name: M:JsonMerge.JsonMerger.TryMergeJson(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to merge JSON objects together, with merge values overwriting input values for matching keys. Returns false if inputs are null, empty, or not valid JSON objects.
member.param: The JSON object to merge into the input.
The merged JSON string, or null if the merge failed.
member.returns: True if the merge succeeded, false otherwise.
